WRITING.TITLE: 808 #8216;s Off?
WRITING.TEXT: Hey guys I #8216;ve Heard from other producers that some of my 808 #8216;s are off so I wanted to ask how? I always put the 808 #8216;s on the Root Note of my melody. When I vary the 808 #8216;s I always take other notes that are within my melody at that point so how can they be off? I really don #8217;t know much about music theory so maybe I #8217;m missing something here. And ideas? Also I #8217;ve heard that some notes within the scale sometimes still don #8217;t sound good, so are there any general rules?

Thank you for you answer bro. But I don #8217;t get the whole 808 tuning concept to be honest. The guy in the video just starts telling you how to do it but not what it is. What exactly does tuning your 808s do? I didn #8217;t understand that
